Verify the content panel becomes visible with height 'auto'
Click the 'Language' dropdown on 'https://www.ecomsite.com/'
Verify the trigger button displays text 'English', has background color #ffffff, and border radius 4px
Verify the dropdown menu list is initially hidden, has width 150px, and padding 0px
Verify the menu item 'Spanish' has text 'Spanish', color #212529, and padding 8px 12px
Verify the 'Spanish' menu item's background color changes to #e9ecef when focused
Verify the dropdown contains exactly 3 language options
Navigate to 'https://www.ecomsite.com/blog/article'
Verify the banner advertisement at the top has image source 'ad_banner_travel.jpg', alt text 'Travel ad', width 970px, and height 250px
Verify a watermark 'AD' is visible on the banner, with font size 10px, color #FFFFFF, and opacity 0.7
Verify the link embedded in the banner has href 'https://ads.example.com/travel_offer'
Verify the image loading duration is less than 750ms
Verify the advertisement is positioned at the top of the viewport with top 0
Click on a date input field
Verify the input field 'Departure Date' has placeholder 'DD/MM/YYYY' and initial empty value
Verify the calendar icon next to the input is visible and has color #6c757d
Verify the date picker panel is initially hidden
Verify the date picker panel becomes visible when the input field is active, has width 320px, height 300px, and is positioned directly below the input
Verify the selected date '2023-11-15' has background color #007bff and font weight 700
Open 'https://www.ecomsite.com/upload'
Verify the 'Choose File' button displays text 'Choose File', has background color #007bff, and text color #ffffff
Verify the file name display initially shows text 'No file selected' with font size 14px and color #6c757d
Verify the progress bar is hidden
Select a file for upload
Verify the progress bar becomes visible and shows width 50% for 3 seconds
Verify the progress bar shows width 100% with background color #28a745 and then disappears
Verify the label 'Max file size' displays 'Max 10MB' with font size 12px
Open 'https://www.ecomsite.com/settings'
Verify the element with tooltip displays text 'Account Info'
Verify the tooltip element is initially hidden and has opacity 0
Hover over the info icon

Verify the tooltip becomes visible with opacity 1, displays text 'Your account details are private', has background color #343a40, text color #ffffff, padding 10px 15px, border radius 5px, and is positioned at x 150px, y 120px when active
Access a long content page at 'https://www.ecomsite.com/articles/long-read'
Verify the scroll container has height 600px and overflow-y property 'auto'
Verify the main content text has font size 16px and color #333333
Verify the initial scroll-top position of the container is 0
Perform a scroll down of 300px
Verify the scroll-top position is 300px
Verify the 'Back to Top' button is initially hidden
Verify the 'Back to Top' button becomes visible when scroll-top exceeds 200px, positioned at right 30px, bottom 30px, with background color #007bff
